e:H36.what: Image submit button missing an alt attribute

e:H37.what: Img element missing an alt attribute

e:H57.what: lang attribute of the document element

w:G141.what: heading structure is not logically nested

e:ARIA6+H53.what: Object elements must contain a text alternative

e:H24.what: Area element in an image map missing an alt attribute

w:G90.what: event handler functionality is available through the keyboard

r3.what: element does not have a unique ID

r28.what: image input element does not have an accessible name

r2.what: image does not have an accessible name

r4.what: lang attribute is either missing, empty, or only whitespace

r7.what: lang attribute does not have a valid primary language subtag

r53.what: heading skips one or more levels

r11.what: link does not have an accessible name

r12.what: button does not have an accessible name

r42.what: element is not owned by an element of its required context role

r43.what: SVG image element does not have an accessible name

r47.what: meta element restricts the ability to zoom

r5.what: lang attribute does not have a valid primary language tag

r68.what: element owns no elements as required by its semantic role

r93.what: style attribute is used to prevent adjusting line-height by using !important

r13.what: iframe does not have an accessible name

r10.what: autocomplete attribute does not have a valid value

duplicate-id.what: id attribute value must be unique

input-image-alt.what: Image buttons must have alternate text

html-has-lang.what: html element must have a lang attribute

valid-lang.what: lang attribute must have a valid value

heading-order.what: Heading levels should only increase by one

object-alt.what: object elements must have alternate text

aria-command-name.what: ARIA commands must have an accessible name

aria-required-parent.what: Certain ARIA roles must be contained by particular parents

svg-img-alt.what: svg elements with an img role must have an alternative text

meta-viewport.what: Zooming and scaling should not be disabled

html-lang-valid.what: html element must have a valid value for the lang attribute

aria-required-children.what: 'Certain ARIA roles must contain particular children

avoid-inline-spacing.what: Inline text spacing must be adjustable with custom stylesheets

frame-title.what: Frames must have an accessible name

aria-allowed-role.what: ARIA role should be appropriate for the element

aria-required-attr.what: Required ARIA attributes must be provided

aria-valid-attr.what: ARIA attributes must conform to valid names

autocomplete-valid.what: autocomplete attribute must be used correctly

color-contrast.what: Elements must have sufficient color contrast

image-redundant-alt.what: Text of buttons and links should not be repeated in the image alternative

document-title.what: Documents must contain a title element

page-has-heading-one.what: Page should contain a level-one heading

select-name.what: Select element must have an accessible name

RPT_Elem_UniqueId.what: Element id attribute values must be unique within a document

v:WCAG20_Input_ExplicitLabelImage.what: input element of type image should have a text alternative

v:WCAG20_Img_HasAlt.what: Images must have an alt attribute if they convey meaning, or alt='' if decorative

WCAG20_Html_HasLang.what: Page detected as HTML, but does not have a lang attribute

v:WCAG20_Object_HasText.what: object elements must have a text alternative

v:HAAC_Img_UsemapAlt.what: Image map or child area has no text alternative

v:WCAG20_Area_HasAlt.what: area element in an image map has no text alternative

v:WCAG20_A_HasText.what: Hyperlinks must have a text description

v:WCAG20_Elem_Lang_Valid.what: lang attribute does not include a valid primary language

v:WCAG20_Frame_HasTitle.what: Inline frames must have a unique, non-empty title attribute

v:aria_semantics_role.what: ARIA roles must be valid for the element to which they are assigned

v:Rpt_Aria_RequiredProperties.what: ARIA role on an element must have required attributes

v:Rpt_Aria_ValidProperty.what: ARIA attributes must be valid for the role

v:WCAG21_Input_Autocomplete.what: autocomplete attribute token(s) must be appropriate for the input form field

v:IBMA_Color_Contrast_WCAG2AA.what: contrast ratio of text with background must meet WCAG 2.1 AA

v:RPT_Header_HasContent.what: Heading elements must provide descriptive text

v:WCAG20_Img_LinkTextNotRedundant.what: text alternative for image within link should not repeat link text or adjacent link text

v:Rpt_Aria_ValidIdRef.what: The ARIA property must reference a non-empty unique id of an existing element that is visible

v:WCAG20_Elem_UniqueAccessKey.what: accesskey attribute values on each element must be unique for the page

v:WCAG20_Input_RadioChkInFieldSet.what: input is in a different group than another with the name

e:alt_area_missing.what: Image map area missing alternative text

57.what: This link has no text inside it

155.what: These headings are not structured in a hierarchical manner

radioSet.what: no or invalid grouping of radio buttons in fieldsets

bulk.what: Count of visible elements as a multiple of 300

embAc.what: active elements embedded in links or buttons

focAll.what: discrepancy between elements that should be and that are Tab-focusable

focOp.what: operable elements that cannot be Tab-focused and vice versa

menuNav.what: nonstandard keyboard navigation among focusable menu items

motion.what: change of visible content not requested by user

styleDiff.what: heading, link, and button style inconsistencies
